paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper reports a heterozygous variant in the TTR gene associated with transthyretin amyloidosis in a 68-year-old Colombian man.

patients.phenotype: transthyretin amyloidosis with heart failure symptoms

individual_records.phenotype_details: heart failure, biceps tendon rupture, neuropathic pain
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Genetic testing identified a heterozygous c.424G>A (p.Val142Ile) variant in the transthyretin gene, consistent with variant transthyretin amyloidosis.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with transthyretin amyloidosis.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is linked to hereditary amyloidosis.
key_quotes: Genetic testing identified a heterozygous c.424G>A (p.Val142Ile) variant in the transthyretin gene, consistent with variant transthyretin amyloidosis.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly reported in the case study.
